summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2552 for the improvement of Lucile Street, from the east end of the viaduct between Tenth Avenue South and Eleventh Avenue South east to the west line of Fifteenth Avenue South, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in the City of Seattle, by planking the same under Ordinance No. 29615, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
